spells.spell-like abilities:
(CL 3rd; concentration +6)

At will-ghost sound (DC 13)

1/day-hideous laughter (DC 14), sleep (DC 14)

treasure: standard (dagger, shortbow with 20 arrows, masterwork panpipes, other treasure)
text: <StatBlockSection Special Abilities  [(u'Panpipes (Su)', u'Three times per day, a faun can use its masterwork panpipes to augment its spell-like abilities. Doing so is a swift action that increases the DC of the next spell-like ability it uses on its turn by +2.')]>
description: This capricious figure has the upper torso, arms, and head of a man, but goatlike legs, a tail, and curling horns on his head.
name: Faun
skills: Acrobatics +8, Bluff +9, Perception +8, Perform (wind) +9, Sense Motive +7, Stealth +9, Survival +4
